jobDescription: We are an Equal Opportunity Employer and do not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, sex, age, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, status as a veteran, and basis of disability or any other federal, state or local protected class. Job Description Arm® is at the heart of the world's most advanced digital products. Our technology enables the creation of new markets and transformation of industries and society. We design scalable, energy efficient-processors and related technologies to deliver the intelligence in applications ranging from sensors to servers, including smartphones, tablets, enterprise infrastructure, high performance computing and the Internet of Things.Our innovative technology is licensed by Arm Partners who have shipped more than 50 billion Systems on Chip (SoCs) containing our intellectual property since the company began in 1990. Together with our Connected Community, we are breaking down barriers to innovation for developers, designers and engineers, ensuring a fast, reliable route to market for leading electronics companies.As a Global Organization, we are a diverse community of dedicated, creative and highly talented professionals. By enabling an inclusive, meritocratic and open workplace where all our people can grow and succeed, we encourage our people to share their rare contributions to Arm's success in the global marketplace.What will I be accountable for?Arm is recognized as an emerging leader in high performance computing with major strategic high-performance computing initiatives around the globe being designed with the Arm architecture. We are searching for a world-class leader for this business who is deeply knowledgeable about the industry (national strategic labs and agencies, government driven HPC initiatives, major global HPC OEMs, etc.).  In this leadership role you will be able to rely on your well-developed professional network to drive Arm based designs into programs around the world. Your deep understanding of technology will also help guide the R&D; investments Arm makes to support these programs. You will reach across multiple organizations within Arm (Arm Research, Corporate R&D;, Sales, etc) to drive a multi-functional team of highly talented people who are all committed to delivering world-class computing architectures to the HPC industry.In addition, you will:Develop and execute market development strategies to adopt Arm based products throughout the global strategic HPC marketsDevelop and execute ecosystem strategies to pull Arm based products through the HPC ecosystemWin key strategic HPC designsPosition Arm as the leader in HPC.
